name: EnergyTrack
signal_source: Burnout research shows early signs include 'persistent fatigue' and 'inability to concentrate' that users struggle to recognize
description: Simple energy level tracker that helps identify patterns in fatigue and mental clarity before burnout occurs
target_user: Busy professionals who experience energy fluctuations but struggle to identify patterns or early warning signs
pain_point_evidence: Users report 'feeling drained when you wake up' and 'finding it difficult to focus' as early indicators they miss
differentiation: Energy pattern focus vs. comprehensive health tracking, simple daily check-ins over complex logging
subscription_fit: Premium includes advanced pattern analysis, wellness recommendations, and export features

pricing.trial_strategy: Free basic tracking, premium for pattern analysis and recommendations
